Commands.HP Regen: Party: Grants BRV equal to own INT BRV;  6 turns HP Regen that marginally recovers HP
Commands.Smite: Holy BRV magic attack  Party: Grants stolen BRV

Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Bravery HP Regen: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using HP Regen
Artifacts.Mighty Smite: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Smite by 10%

Passives.HP Regen Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using HP Regen.
Passives.Smite Charge: Increases the max uses of Smite by 1.
Passives.HP Regen BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using HP Regen.
Passives.HP Damage BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after taking HP damage.
Passives.HP Regen Charge: Increases the max uses of HP Regen by 1.
Passives.Smite Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Smite.
Passives.Blessing of Madain Sari: Grants +1 turn to pre-existing buffs when buffing allies.

Weapons.Priest Racket CP: 15: Extends the duration of HP Regen to 12 turns.Grants Small Attack Up and Small Max BRV Up for 12 turns.
Weapons.Magic Racket CP: 35: Increases Smite's potency and lowers its Action Delay.Raises all party members' BRV based on Eiko's Attack.Grants Medium Speed Up for 5 turns.
